natures.name: Architect
natures.description: You have a vision of how things should be and wish to make it reality.
natures.recovery: Successfully establish order out of chaos or implement a plan that improves a situation.

natures.name: Autocrat
natures.description: You need to be in charge, as only you know what's best.
natures.recovery: Successfully lead others in endeavors where your leadership was crucial.

natures.name: Caregiver
natures.description: You feel compelled to help those in need.
natures.recovery: Successfully protect or nurture someone else at risk to yourself.

natures.name: Conformist
natures.description: You follow the crowd and seek safety in numbers.
natures.recovery: Find acceptance and comfort by doing what is expected of you by your peers.

natures.name: Conniver
natures.description: Why work hard when you can work smart?
natures.recovery: Gain something important by outsmarting someone.
